channel.title: [Tut]Upgrading the ::tele command
channel.description:
Basically, what with some new areas like Keldagrim and the likes now having 5 digit co ordinates, it's time to update your ::tele command
Find Client.java, and search ::tele
This should be there:
[code] int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,9)); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,14)); [/code]
Delete it, and paste in this new one.
[code] int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10)); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11,16)); [/code]
Compile and Run.
This basically means that even though you can do 02837 10098, it means that you will need to add a 0 infront of most of your teleporting, so for example ::tele 01234 04321, so if you don't want to have to do that, don't do it.
Just for you to test out, take a look at the following co ordinates :-P
Keldagrim: 02892, 10221 troll romance cave: 02776 10228 weird cave: 02933 10084 another weird cave: 02923 10032 eadgars goutweed store room: 02858 10078 cave: 02886 10082 troll stronghold prison: 02837 10098 place to keldagrim boat thing: 02838 10125 mountain daughter cave: 02774 10068 slayer dungeon: 02775 10003 weird dungeon: 02773 10161

item.title: [Tut]Upgrading the ::tele command
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

It didn’t have EVERY location. Well, not the co ords anyway. It told you to run north from a place, or use those prayer buttons to do it. This doesn’t require you to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: [Tut]Upgrading the ::tele command
item.dc:creator: @Trigun Trigun
item.description:
@Trigun wrote:

Works for me, works fine… But does anyone have that long list from Kaitnieks with all of the locations of every major/minor place on the map?

Read full topic

@Calvin wrote:

for locations like Varrock, just place a 0 infront of them, making them 5 digit co ordinates.

Can anyone else get it to work, because it works on mine.

item.title: [Tut]Upgrading the ::tele command
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

Basically, what with some new areas like Keldagrim and the likes now having 5 digit co ordinates, it’s time to update your ::tele command

Find Client.java, and search ::tele

This should be there:

int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,9));
int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,14));

Delete it, and paste in this new one.

int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10));
int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11,16));

Compile and Run.

This basically means that even though you can do 02837 10098, it means that you will need to add a 0 infront of most of your teleporting, so for example ::tele 01234 04321, so if you don’t want to have to do that, don’t do it.

Just for you to test out, take a look at the following co ordinates

Keldagrim: 02892, 10221
troll romance cave: 02776 10228
weird cave: 02933 10084
another weird cave: 02923 10032
eadgars goutweed store room: 02858 10078
cave: 02886 10082
troll stronghold prison: 02837 10098
place to keldagrim boat thing: 02838 10125
mountain daughter cave: 02774 10068
slayer dungeon: 02775 10003
weird dungeon: 02773 10161

Read full topic
